source.52d28f51:
import pandas as pd
import numpy as np
from matplotlib import pyplot as plt
import seaborn as sns
source.a0978885:
olympic_df.rename(columns={'Gold Medal':'Gold',
                            "Silver Medal":"Silver",
                            'Bronze Medal':'Bronze',
                            "Rank By Total":'World_rank'
                           },inplace=True)
source.1e907c4c:
plt.figure(figsize=(20,14))
sns.barplot(x='Country',y='Gold',data=olympic_df)
plt.plot(olympic_df.Country,olympic_df.Gold,marker='s',c='g',ls='-',lw=3,ms=5,mew=1,mec='navy');
plt.tick_params(axis='x',which='major',labelsize=13,rotation=90)
plt.tick_params(axis='y',which='major',labelsize=20)
plt.title("Gold Medal Won By Each Countries",fontsize=30,pad=20)
plt.xlabel("Countries",fontsize=25)
plt.ylabel("Gold Medals Won",fontsize=25)
plt.legend(['Countries',' Gold Medals Won']);
plt.grid(color='g',linestyle='-',linewidth=0.3,alpha=0.5)

source.e5fe6ee1:
plt.figure(figsize=(20,14))
sns.barplot(x='Country',y='World_rank',data=olympic_df)
plt.plot(olympic_df.Country,olympic_df.World_rank,marker='s',c='g',ls='-',lw=3,ms=5,mew=1,mec='navy');
plt.tick_params(axis='x',which='major',labelsize=13,rotation=90)
plt.tick_params(axis='y',which='major',labelsize=20)
plt.title("Ranking of Each Countries",fontsize=30,pad=20)
plt.xlabel("Countries",fontsize=25)
plt.ylabel("World Rank ",fontsize=25)

plt.grid(color='g',linestyle='-',linewidth=0.3,alpha=0.5)
source.99005155:
plt.figure(figsize=(20,14))

plt.plot(olympic_df.Country,olympic_df.Total,marker='s',c='g',ls='-',lw=3,ms=5,mew=1,mec='navy');
plt.tick_params(axis='x',which='major',labelsize=13,rotation=90)
plt.tick_params(axis='y',which='major',labelsize=20)
plt.title("Total Medal Won By Each Countries",fontsize=30,pad=20)
plt.xlabel("Countries",fontsize=25)
plt.ylabel("Total Medals Won",fontsize=25)
plt.legend(['Countries',' Total Medals Won']);
plt.grid(color='g',linestyle='-',linewidth=0.3,alpha=0.5)

source.93526ca2: **The Olympic Games are leading international sporting events  in which thousands of athletes from around the world participate in a variety of competitions. The Olympic Games are considered the world's foremost sports competition with more than 200 nations participating. The Olympic Games are normally held every four years, alternating between the Summer and Winter Olympics every two years in the four-year period. In Tokyo Olympic,around 11,656 atheletes took part from 205+ Countries.**
